snippet: The Supreme Court on Monday threw out a lower court ruling that upheld a legislative redistricting plan in North Carolina criticized as an effort to diminish the influence of black voters.
abstract: Supreme Court throws out lower court ruling that upheld legislative redistricting plan in North Carolina, which was criticized by some as effort to diminish influence of black voters.
lead_paragraph: The Supreme Court on Monday threw out a lower court ruling that upheld a legislative redistricting plan in North Carolina criticized as an effort to diminish the influence of black voters.

headline.main: Court Orders Second Look at Redistricting
headline.print_headline: Court Orders Second Look at Redistricting
